info.brief: Siddharth is pursuing his Master's degree in Computer Engineering from Virginia Tech and has earned his Bachelors degree from IIT Roorkee, India. He has 3 years of industry work experience as a software developer. He currently focuses on building application developement framework for a specific Cloud Computing paradigm known as Fog Computing. He has build web application using technologies like Node.js, java servlets, MangoDB, HTTP/CSS and jQuery.
